畇字的基本解释

畇
yún
〔畇畇〕平坦整齐，如“畇畇原隰，曾孙田之。”

畇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》羊倫切，平諄，以。］
［《廣韻》相綸切，平諄，心。］
［《廣韻》詳遵切，平諄，邪。］
开垦。参见“畇畇”。

畇字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畇； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页760第07
【廣韻】羊倫切【集韻】【韻會】兪倫切【正韻】于分切，?音勻。【爾雅·釋訓】畇畇，田也。【註】言墾辟也。【詩·小雅】畇畇原隰。【註】墾辟貌。　又【廣韻】相倫切【集韻】須倫切，?音荀。又【廣韻】詳遵切。【集韻】相倫切，?音旬。義?同。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?規倫切，音均。【六書故】原田一往平均也。　又【集韻】戸犬切，音甽。義同。　又【廣韻】徒年切【集韻】亭年切，?音田。地名。在絳。　又【集韻】堂練切，音甸。義同。

畇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
畇字的起名意思

[畇畇]田地平坦整齐的样子。

reclaimed land
Basic explanation of words
reclaimed land
yún
〔畇畇] is flat and tidy, such as "畇畇原隰, great-grandson Tianzhi."
reclaimed land
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Guangyun" sheep Lun cut, flat and honest, with. ]
["Guangyun" is connected with each other, flat and honest, heart. ]
["Guangyun" follows the cut in detail, flat and honest, evil. ]
reclamation. See also "畇畇".
reclaimed land

[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　畇; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 760 Page 07
[Guang Yun] Sheep Lun cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] He Lun cut [Zheng Rhyme] in slitting,? Sound even. 【Erya·Shixun】Liu Yu, Tian Ye. [Note] Words are also open. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Hikaruhara 隰. [Note] Reclamation of appearance.　 [Guang Yun] Xiang Lun Qi [Ji Yun] Xu Lun Qi,? Yin Xun. And [Guang Yun] follow and cut in detail. [Ji Yun] Xiang Lian Qi,? Yin Xun. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Rules and cuts, all sounds. [Six Ancient Books] Harada also averaged.　[Jiyun] The dog cuts, the sound is dysfunctional. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Cut in the Year of the Ting [Ji Yun] Cut in the Year of the Pavilion,? Yin Tian. Place name. In Jiang.　[Jiyun] Tang Lianqi, Yindian. The same meaning.
